text: @NBCNews @CNBC This is not true. COVID-19 could possibly have been stopped if actions were taken very early on. Now, it is very unlikely. Like other flues,it will most likely continue to circulate. Even if we somehow eradicate it from humans, it is still passed among animals and could reappear
